snippet.title: Gothic - Playable Teaser - Trailer
snippet.description:
"Welcome to the colony!" 

The original Gothic returns remade... as a playable teaser.

If you own any Piranha Bytes game on Steam, the yet untitled Gothic Remake project should be in your library by now.

To find out what the Gothic fanbase thinks, we wanted to start an experiment with our new developer team THQ Nordic Barcelona. After playing the prototype, you decide if we should proceed with a full remake or leave all the great memories untouched.

Check out the comparison video: https://youtu.be/Crc2iO_-LR8

Steam Store: http://n.thq.com/cLPi30q1AWK

Learn more: https://www.gothic-game.com/

#Gothic #ReturnToTheColony
